extendedInfo.description: EMT Basic review material on the go.Over 900 Quiz Questions and 900 Flashcards! The EMT tutor is a comprehensive training tool for the EMT Basic. Whether you are a seasoned veteran or starting class this app will position you for success in the real world. If you are a student going through class you will benefit from this app. Simultaneously, so will a seasoned veteran in the EMS field that is trying to stay current on recent developments, (who knew tourniquets are back in?). The material has been prepared and verified with 2011 text books and includes the additional information now presented in most classes that includes Pathophysiology, Life Span Development, and expanded Anatomy and Physiology sections. Over 900 Possible quiz questions and flashcards available. Prepare for class or review for the NREMT Exam with the EMTutor. 5 major components differentiate us from our competitors: 1. A Bookmarking feature that allows the user to save difficult questions, flashcards, or scenarios for later study. This allows the user to tailor the experience to their needs. 2. Explanations so that the user learns from every question and flashcard. 3. Over 900 Quiz Questions and 900 Flashcards prepared by EMS instructors that are involved in both EMS education, and running calls in the streets. This enables the material to be relevant for students and to prepare you for the real world as an EMT-B. 4. A Scenario based section has been developed to aid in taking text book material from page to street. Over 50 scenarios are given here, with more to come, that a user can go through on their own or with a field instructor to stimulate the thinking processes that occur on a 911 call.5. Material that has been developed by EMS educators that are current on latest NREMT developments. Our material has been developed for the iPhone user and cannot be found on a website somewhere for free. Because of this we believe that our material is for learning and teaching on the iPhone not for assessing how smart the user is. Other material is built to assess, ours is built to teach. Please feel free to Email any questions or concerns to: code3apps@yahoo.com, we are always willing to help in any way. Good luck on your EMT Exam and stay safe out there.

reviews.title: Great study tool
reviews.comment: This is an amazing app and an great resource for any EMT. The only problem I have noticed is that on a few quiz questions there are duplicate correct answers but one is marked wrong. Thanks for the resource.
reviews.author: John Rheinheimer

reviews.title: A few problems
reviews.comment: I used this as a pretest study guide and a bunch of questions\' rationale answers were completely wrong and them wrong ones where on the NREMT-B test, luckily I caught a lot of the mistakes when reviewing the text book\'s chapters. So do not use this as a sole means of a study aid.
reviews.author: J- ROC

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This helped me out big time, all the way up to minutes before taking the National Registry!
reviews.author: Brandon McKenzie

reviews.title: Some problems
reviews.comment: This is a great app with the exception that there are alot of missing words in most of the Q&A\'s. And there are some question that have the same two choices for answer and one of the answers is wrong when chosen.
reviews.author: James Spencer

reviews.title: Amazing.
reviews.comment: If your going thru school. Get this app seriously. Working with me every chapter. :) thanks
reviews.author: Nathan Boone

reviews.title: The best app out for emt
reviews.comment: I have tried half a dozen apps and this one is the best one to help you master each category you will go over in your Basic class.
reviews.author: Preston Lyons

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Its pretty good but does not seem to be up to the new standard and some questions are out of EMT scope. But its a wonderful refresher.
reviews.author: Jeff Fox

reviews.title: Don\'t download
reviews.comment: The sections of questions are hundreds of questions long
reviews.author: Chase Singleton

reviews.title: great app for studying
reviews.comment: really great app to study for national registry. it helped me study and pass the registry. the questions and scenarios are very close to the actual tests. totally worth buying.
reviews.author: maisa morrar

reviews.title: Very good, with one fatal flaw
reviews.comment: Great content, up to date with 10th ed AAOS, bookmarks now working properly once again. Excellent app for emt students.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dustin C.
reviews.comment: This app is great. Easy to use on the go. It is still recommended to use your original literature from the class to help you along. This app will help get you thinking about the more difficult scenarios. Good luck on your test.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please update
reviews.comment: The app itself is extremely helpful. Used it for my EMT finals and still use it every once in awhile to refresh memory. Unfortunately, the app isn\'t compatible with high-res screens and some of the questions need to be restated/updated/added.  Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It\'s a really great to for studying. The bookmark function is a huge help, though it erased all my saved quearions and flashcards after the last update. Still well worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid Razr MaXx
reviews.comment: Does what it says, nothing to report negative on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: Was a great app. No it won\'t work at all... If I answer a question it shuts down
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great study guide
reviews.comment: This is the first app I\'ve ever paid for... the free version was good, but needed more help
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Great app, very handy and has some really good practice scenarios and questions. My only complaint it that it doesn\'t shuffle the quiz or save your progress if you have to leave it. If that was adjusted, it\'d be perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User
